title: Did major media directors "reconsider" the coverage of the abortion doctor Ulrik Klopfer?
subtitle: NBC News: "Thousands of foetal remains were found on property in Illinois owned by a recently deceased doctor and performed abortions."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: ABC, CBS, NBC, MSNBC, NPR and PBS refused to cover abortion, which kept 2,246 children aborted.
